sect2.title: Core
sect2.para: Windows specific error messages are no longer localized, but instead always displayed in English to better match PHP error messages.
Preliminary and highly experimental support for building on ARM64 has been added.

sect2.title: OCI8
sect2.para: Because building against Oracle Client 10g is no longer supported anyway, the configuration option --with-oci8 has been dropped. The --with-oci8-11g, --with-oci8-12c and --with-oci8-19 configuration options are still supported.

sect2.title: Zip
sect2.para: The Zip extension is upgraded to version 1.21.0, and is now built as shared library (DLL) by default.
